org.springframework.http.server.reactive

类 UndertowHttpHandlerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.http.server.reactive.HttpHandlerAdapterSupport

  • 所有已实现的接口:

    public class UndertowHttpHandlerAdapter
extends HttpHandlerAdapterSupport
implements io.undertow.server.HttpHandler
    Adapt HttpHandler to the Undertow HttpHandler.
    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Marek Hawrylczak, Rossen Stoyanchev, Arjen Poutsma
